co.cask.coopr.common.zookeeper
Class ZKClientExt

java.lang.Object
  co.cask.coopr.common.zookeeper.ZKClientExt

public final class ZKClientExt
extends Object

Extension to standard operations provided by ZKClient.

Nested Class Summary

          Result of createOrSet(ZKClient, String, byte[], org.apache.zookeeper.CreateMode, boolean) operation.

          Acts as ZKClient.create(String, byte[], org.apache.zookeeper.CreateMode, boolean) if node does not exist, otherwise as ZKClient.setData(String, byte[]).

          Acts as ZKClient.delete(String) if passed ignoreIfAbsent param is false.

createOrSet

public static com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<ZKClientExt.SetResult> createOrSet(org.apache.twill.zookeeper.ZKClient zkClient,
                                                                                                    String path,
                                                                                                    @Nullable
                                                                                                    byte[] data,
                                                                                                    org.apache.zookeeper.CreateMode createMode,
                                                                                                    boolean createParent)
Acts as ZKClient.create(String, byte[], org.apache.zookeeper.CreateMode, boolean) if node does not exist, otherwise as ZKClient.setData(String, byte[]).

delete

public static com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<String> delete(org.apache.twill.zookeeper.ZKClient zkClient,
                                                                                String path,
                                                                                boolean ignoreIfAbsent)
Same as calling delete(zkClient, path, -1, ignoreIfAbsent).

delete

public static com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<String> delete(org.apache.twill.zookeeper.ZKClient zkClient,
                                                                                String path,
                                                                                int version,
                                                                                boolean ignoreIfAbsent)
Acts as ZKClient.delete(String) if passed ignoreIfAbsent param is false. Otherwise the same way but doesn't throw exception if node doesn't exists. In latter case sets null in returned future.

ensureExists

public static com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<String> ensureExists(org.apache.twill.zookeeper.ZKClient zkClient,
                                                                                      String path)
Acts as create(path, null, CreateMode.PERSISTENT, true) if node doesn't exist. Otherwise has no affect. In latter case sets null in returned future.

getDataOrNull

public static com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<org.apache.twill.zookeeper.NodeData> getDataOrNull(org.apache.twill.zookeeper.ZKClient zkClient,
                                                                                                                    String path)
Same as calling getDataOrNull(zkClient, path, null).

getDataOrNull

public static com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<org.apache.twill.zookeeper.NodeData> getDataOrNull(org.apache.twill.zookeeper.ZKClient zkClient,
                                                                                                                    String path,
                                                                                                                    @Nullable
                                                                                                                    org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher watcher)
Acts as ZKClient.getData(String, Watcher) if node exists. Otherwise sets null in returned future.

getChildrenOrNull

public static com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<org.apache.twill.zookeeper.NodeChildren> getChildrenOrNull(org.apache.twill.zookeeper.ZKClient zkClient,
                                                                                                                            String path)
Same as calling getChildrenOrNull(zkClient, path, null).

getChildrenOrNull

public static com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<org.apache.twill.zookeeper.NodeChildren> getChildrenOrNull(org.apache.twill.zookeeper.ZKClient zkClient,
                                                                                                                            String path,
                                                                                                                            @Nullable
                                                                                                                            org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher watcher)
Acts as ZKClient.getChildren(String, Watcher) if node exists. Otherwise sets null in returned future.
